text: Vahe'mofo mofavre Izikieliga, Israeli mopafima haviza hu'nea ranra kumatmimpima nemani'za vahe'mo'za amanage hu'za nevaze, Abrahamu'a magoke ne' mani'neanagi Anumzamo Israeli mopa amigeno erisantihareno mani'neane. Hianagi menina tagra rama'a vahe mani'nonankino, tamagerfa huno ama mopa Anumzamo'a tagri tami'ne hu'za nehaze.
